name: Express Delivery - Demo
description:
-Alpha Demo Version-

Express Delivery is a small indie development project I made by myself. The full version isn't finished yet. 

Please feel free to play and let me know what you think :)

If you wish to support this games development leave a donation at my patreon and you will also get a special mention! - 

-note- The game is still in development and if I take your advice I will give special thanks in the creds!

Thank you for playing and have fun!
